resources.string:
This is application is beneficial using in organisations giving tasks by the manager or team leader of the organisation. This is why it is denominated as Task Master by our team. 

This is used to provide task to several subordinates and clients working in the organisation or anywhere else (Work From Home) by the manager or Team Leader. This helps you in a way that you don't need to go to the subordinates and clients or call them to provide them new tasks. 

It is done only by just a click and sub-ordinate can submit it once it is done. This is how we can stop holding trivial meetings (means calling clients and providing tasks) providing them task only through Task Master. This application save your time..
This application is dedicated to Mr. Kunwar Anupam Singh (IPS). We are proudly thankful to him
\u0022Time flies fast, but it\'s good that you are the pilot.\u0022
Internet connection is not available\nor Unstable
